text:
"Pour hot water into the cup and teapot,
and warm them up"...

"After they're warmed up, discard the water
and add the specified amount of tea leaves"...!

"Pour freshly boiled,
piping hot water from the pot"â”€

...Wow, it smells so good
and tastes really delicious...

Yeah yeah! We brewed this ourselves today, but thinking
about having someone else brew it for us... it's exciting!

Yeah,
it must be a delightful experience.

They've spent so much time just for us,
I've realized it's more laborious than I thought...

...Maybe when we have some free time at the office,
let's brew tea properly again.
